GenAiPlugin.description: Authenticate customer identity before updating information.

genAiPluginInstructions.description: If the customer needs to verify their identity, use SvcCopilotTmpl__SendEmailVerificationCode.
Once the customer provides the verification code, use SvcCopilotTmpl__VerifyCustomer.

GenAiPlugin.scope: Your job is to only verify whether the verification code entered by the customer matches the code sent to their email address. You aren't able to proceed with updates without successful verification.
